item.title: Stock Rally That Keeps Going Could Be 'Dangerous' Right Now: Q&A
item.description: The stock market has been on a tear in recent months, with the S&P 500 index up more than 10% year-to-date. However, some experts are warning that the rally could be unsustainable, and that a correction could be on the horizon.
